items.text: good length on the fifth stump line, Ambris shoulders arms
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, steers it to third man's right with a horizontal bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 2 runs

items.text: ooh there's some nice shape away. Pitches on a length outside off and keeps going away, the batsman had wisely shouldered arms
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, chopped to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: past slip. Good length in the corridor and he has a jab at it, ends up half-edging and half-steering it fine, just out of reach of first slip diving to his right
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 2 runs

items.text: squirted to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.preText: Nafis Sajid Sam: "Mehedi is a bright prospect for Bangladesh no doubt, but in this type of condition and the world cup coming ahead BD should try playing 3 proper seamers. Saifuddin is not yet established as a seaming all rounder who can be termed as a proper seamers."
items.text: fuller, punched off the front foot but can't get past cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: good length around off, he stays back and opens the face to glide it to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: another loud shout turned down. This would have probably gone over the stumps and missed leg. Back of a length and nipping in, Ambris wanted to pull it, but misses, it hits him on the thigh pad
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

items.text: top edge falls safe. Mortaza is giving Ambris plenty of problems. He was coming down the track and Mortaza shortened his length, the batsman went for the pull but got an edge, just looped over midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: swats it off the under-edge to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: that's a better looking shot. A touch too full and Hope comes forward confidently to drive this through extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, FOUR runs

items.preText: Deepak Gupta: "@saurabh_42 - Is DRS available for this series ?" - No it's not
items.text: back of a length outside off, he has a slash at it, but backward point dives to his left to stop the ball
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: good length on that teasing line outside off, patted back to the bowler off the front foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off again, he pushes it between cover and point and they take the quick single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he stays back and flicks it to mid-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, dabbed to third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: fullish around off, clipped but straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.preText: Ghaffy: "A great day for Aleem Dar. Standing in his 200th ODIs...Great Achievement." - Indeed
items.text: length ball, nipping into him, gets his bat down in time to jab it away
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, cuts it to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, 1 run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs
Mohammad Saifuddin to Ambris, FOUR runs
